demo_cols: 7. Did you receive a waiver or scholarship at your university?
q_cols: 1. In a semester, how often have you felt upset due to something that happened in your academic affairs?
2. In a semester, how often you felt as if you were unable to control important things in your academic affairs?
3. In a semester, how often you felt nervous and stressed because of academic pressure?
4. In a semester, how often you felt as if you could not cope with all the mandatory academic activities? (e.g, assignments, quiz, exams)
5. In a semester, how often you felt confident about your ability to handle your academic / university problems?
6. In a semester, how often you felt as if things in your academic life is going on your way?
7. In a semester, how often are you able to control irritations in your academic / university affairs?
8. In a semester, how often you felt as if your academic performance was on top?
9. In a semester, how often you got angered due to bad performance or low grades that is beyond your control?
10. In a semester, how often you felt as if academic difficulties are piling up so high that you could not overcome them?
11. In a semester, how often you felt nervous, anxious or on edge due to academic pressure?
12. In a semester, how often you were not able to stop or control worrying about your academic affairs?
13. In a semester, how often you worried too much about academic affairs?
14. In a semester, how often you had trouble relaxing due to academic pressure?
15. In a semester, how often you were so restless due to academic pressure that it is hard to sit still?
16. In a semester, how often you became easily annoyed or irritated because of academic pressure?
17. In a semester, how often you felt afraid, as if something awful might happen?
18. In a semester, how often have you had little interest or pleasure in doing things?
19. In a semester, how often have you been feeling down, depressed or hopeless?
20. In a semester, how often have you had trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much?
21. In a semester, how often have you been feeling tired or having little energy?
22. In a semester, how often have you had poor appetite or overeating?
23. In a semester, how often have you been feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down?
24. In a semester, how often have you had trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the books or watching television?
25. In a semester, how often have you moved or spoke too slowly for other people to notice? Or you've been moving a lot more than usual because you've been restless?
26. In a semester, how often have you had thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself?
